titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 1646) to authorize appropriations for the Department of State for fiscal years 2002 and 2003, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-682, by Mr. Diaz-Balart.
All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 214.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 545.
DEBATE - The House continued with debate on H. Res. 545.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/24/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 1646 (FY 2002 and 2003 Department of State authorization).
